title: Bitcoin Struggles to Hold $63K Ahead of Fed Meeting
description: After falling below $61K briefly this morning, Bitcoin is struggling to stay above $63,000 with hours to go before the FOMC meeting.

title: Memeinator Presale Enters Into Final Stage With Over 96% Tokens Sold
description: London, United Kingdom, March 20th, 2024, Chainwire Memeinator’s presale has entered its final stage with 4% of the total supply of tokens remaining before it becomes available for public trading. The team has observed the presale’s impact among meme coin enthusiasts, driven by its Terminator-inspired branding and ambition to lead in the meme coin market. […]

title: Current crypto boom is fueled by retail investors, says Goldman Sachs
description: Recently, the excitement around cryptocurrencies has hit a new peak, and surprisingly, it’s the everyday folks, not the big-time financial gurus, who are steering this ship. The word on Wall Street, straight from Goldman Sachs’ digital assets head honcho, Mathew McDermott, reveals that while the suits are starting to dip their toes, it’s the regular […]

title: CHIPS Act Pumps $8.5 Billion into Intel’s Expansion
description: Intel, the renowned semiconductor giant, has struck a significant deal with the US government under the CHIPS and Science Act. The agreement entails a substantial infusion of up to $8.5 billion in direct funding from the Department of Commerce.  Intel’s US manufacturing expansion This financial support aims to bolster Intel’s efforts to amplify its manufacturing […]

title: Japan raises interest rates for the first time in nearly two decades
description: Let’s cut to the chase: Japan just took a giant leap, hiking interest rates for the first time since 2007. Yeah, you read that right. After years of what seemed like an endless waltz with negative interest rates, the Bank of Japan has decided it’s time to turn the page. With Kazuo Ueda at the […]

title: France Fines Google €250 Million for Breaching Intellectual Property Rules
description: France’s competition watchdog has imposed a substantial fine of €250 million on Alphabet’s Google for violations related to EU intellectual property regulations concerning its dealings with media publishers. The fine stems from concerns regarding Google’s AI service, particularly its chatbot, previously known as Bard, now rebranded as Gemini. Breaches and settlement proceedings The Autorite de […]

title: Hong Kong’s custodian Hex Trust seeks new funding amid rising appetite for crypto
description: Animoca-backed Asian crypto custodian Hex Trust aims to achieve profitability, while seeking more funding amid the crypto market recovery. Hong Kong-headquartered crypto custodian Hex Trust is set to start discussions about raising additional funds later this year, as the crypto…

title: Umoja Secures $2 Million Extension in Seed Funding Round
description: Umoja, a smart money protocol, secures $2 million more in funding, totaling $4 million, led by industry veteran Robby Greenfield. Its Synths technology enables the creation of advanced financial tools, aiming to level the investment field for retail investors. Umoja, a smart money protocol, has bolstered its financial standing with an additional $2 million infusion [...]

title: EigenLayer Prepares For Mainnet Launch; Bitcoin (BTC) Dominance Continues; Investors Bet on InQubeta (QUBE) For Huge Gains
description: EigenLayer, the novel Ethereum restaking project, published a roadmap outlining plans to launch its mainnet and go live. In a blog post released on Thursday, Eigen Labs stated, “Our primary focus remains a smooth launch that prioritizes both security and performance.” In other news, Bitcoin’s (BTC) dominance persists—no surprises here—as it continues with its price [...]

title: BRLA Token: Revolutionizing Brazil’s Payments Sector with XRP Ledger Technology
description: Renowned Fintech company in Brazil explores and tests XRP Ledger for payment processing of its stablecoin BRLA.  BRLA is said to be pegged to the Brazilian Real as part of the plan to maintain stability.  Amidst the dynamic landscape of Fintech innovation, a groundbreaking development is culminating with BRLA Digital being at the center of [...]

title: Solana Co-Founder Warns Against Pre-Sale Investments
description:
Navigating pre-sale investments requires more than just enthusiasm; it demands caution and due diligence. Anatoly Yakovenko, Solana’s co-founder, advises caution, highlighting the blockchain’s support for decentralized apps and currencies. Yakovenko’s Caution: Navigating Solana’s Landscape Yakovenko’s cautionary advice is underscored by a revealing chart shared by the pseudonymous online investigator ZachXBT. title: Alipay+ D-Store Adopts Avalanche for Web3-Enabled Voucher Program
description:
Alipay+ D-Store, a solution that provides a full-stack online tool for merchants, has adopted the Avalanche blockchain. According to a blog post on the Avalanche website, Alipay+ D-Store, through a partner in Southeast Asia, has introduced a Web3-enabled voucher program via a branded mini-game.  Avalanche highlighted that users who access the vouchers can earn up […]
